programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When Chris Vaughn returns to his hometown to find work, he finds that the lumber mill has closed and the town's big business is now a casino. Aided by his friend Ray Templeton, Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: A counselor (The Rock) at a juvenile detention facility turns a group of young criminals into a football team to teach them self-respect and responsibility.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young woman is attacked in her apartment, evidence points to traumatic events from her buried past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 4-year-old student makes claims of sexual abuse against a singing coach and popular TV personality (Billy Porter).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Murphy question a television producer when he is accused of molesting his daughter; Benson strives to discover the truth as accusations fly in the media.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A famous fashion photographer accused of raping a young model asks his successful brother to help him avoid charges.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a pop star is assaulted in her home, the SVU investigates the public feud between her rapper husband and a competing recording artist; Fin's family ties to a suspect take him off the case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A Triad assassin poisons a Homeland Security agent; the discovery of a warehouse of counterfeit purses reveals a money trail to stolen government funds; Nell joins the team in the field.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The murder of a Navy machinist sends the team on a citywide hunt for evidence; Anna Kolcheck (Bar Paly) partners with Callen and Sam in the on-going mole investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A maintenance worker with a dark history puts a local teenager in danger; Sam has to choose which of his colleagues he'll take to the football game.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young woman is attacked in her apartment, evidence points to traumatic events from her buried past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson questions Detective Qadri's involvement in the case of a district attorney who fell to her death.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate when a woman scheduled to testify in a high-profile rape case is murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives are called to investigate when a hotel maid reports being assaulted by a powerful Italian diplomat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a dancer is raped by a man with a unique tattoo, details of the case remind Rollins of a serial rapist she was tracking in Atlanta.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate when woman visiting from Buffalo, N.Y., claims her car was stolen with her baby in the backseat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Rollins investigate when a mental patient says he witnessed a rape, but the alleged victim denies the assault happened.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a child disappears on his way home from school, Benson and Amaro interview the distraught parents, who don't trust the police; with the help of their TARU tech (Gilbert Gottfried) and a meddling reporter, the detectives narrow the suspects list.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives find a missing 14-year-old working as a prostitute, they set up a sting to put the johns away for statutory rape and find one of her customers is a former professional football player.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a rape of an actress during a theater production.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into a home invasion that ended with two dead leads to a shocking revelation about Detective Rollins.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A rape investigation leads to one of Detective Benson's old cases being reopened; as Benson's work is scrutinized, her relationship with Executive ADA David Haden is put in jeopardy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man sees his wife abducted while video chatting with her, but Benson finds that the victim tried to pick up the ransom herself.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A vigilante group forms in response to a string of rapes; concerns over his wife's fidelity distract Amaro.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a contestant from a reality dating series says she was raped; the producers of the series make Benson and the team part of the show.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a corrections officer is arrested for sexually assaulting female inmates, the union that supports him set their sights on Barba and the SVU.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While the investigation of a corrections officer accused of assaulting female inmates deepens, the union backing the accused man takes action that threatens the lives of the SVU team members.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson questions Detective Qadri's involvement in the case of a district attorney who fell to her death.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate when a woman scheduled to testify in a high-profile rape case is murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives are called to investigate when a hotel maid reports being assaulted by a powerful Italian diplomat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a dancer is raped by a man with a unique tattoo, details of the case remind Rollins of a serial rapist she was tracking in Atlanta.

The first responders take calls involving an unusual domestic disturbance, a "death" at a psychic's place, and a motorcycle crash; Bobby dips his toes into the dating pool; Abby walks down memory lane, and Buck is confronted by his past actions.
Hen relives her evolution into the firefighter she is today as she recalls the first times she met Chimney and Athena.

During the holidays, the first responders must deal with a stampede at a toy store, a mistletoe stunt gone awry and neighbors competing in a Christmas light showdown; Bobby contemplates his future with Athena; Chimney and Buck try to help Maddie.
Bobby meets Athena's parents for the first time; Maddie attempts to end her marriage for good, causing Doug to insinuate himself even deeper into Chimney's life.
Looking back at how Chimney joined Station 118 and became the firefighter and paramedic he is today.
The first responders rally together to search for a missing Maddie.

The call center is hit with a system-wide power outage and must go old school to respond to emergencies; the first responders must deal with explosions in multiple homes and a difficult child birth; Michael confronts Bobby about parenting his kids.
When a going-away party for a bank manager turns into an emergency, the first responders are accused of pulling off a daring heist.
After his devastating family tragedy in Minnesota, Bobby Nash moves to Los Angeles to start over, where he becomes captain of the 118 and meets Athena Grant for the first time.
The first responders deal with a calamity at a chocolate factory; a mail bomb explosion; Eddie receives some surprising news from Shannon; Maddie contemplates her future in the call center.

The team races to save workers in a high-rise during a fire drill, car accident victims, and siblings fighting over a family heirloom; Buck gives Bobby surprising news; Eddie helps Christopher deal with the trauma caused by the tsunami.

The 118 races to help protesters at a slaughter house and a wife who finds herself trapped in a "rage room" with her husband's mistress; Athena takes action after Michael, May and Harry experience a traumatic traffic stop.
